entities.name: fr ed
entities.description: Fr ed is taking orders from Gryffindors. He is mentioned as 'who was taking orders'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who wants to add her name to the waiting list and is asked by Fr ed for payment.

entities.name: gryffindors
entities.description: Gryffindors are a group of students clamoring for orders from Fr ed.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is sitting at the table with Ron and Hermione, staring at their schoolbags.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is sitting at the table with Harry and Hermione, staring at their schoolbags.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: A silver-tailed Weasley rocket zoomed past the window.

relationships.description: Fr ed is taking orders from Gryffindors.
Hermione wants to add her name to the waiting list and is asked by Fr ed for payment.
Harry, Ron, and Hermione are sitting together at the table.
